Riverside Festival 2019 Gearing Up to Be Biggest Edition to Date!

Posted by Brittany Prevost on August 27, 2019

TICKETS

It's been almost a decade since Gatineau Quebec's Riverside Festival was born. Over the years, the highly anticipated fest' has wiggled its way into its attendees' hearts and is known as one of the best events to send off the summer.

Whether you're there for the music, or the undeniably blissful atmosphere, or perhaps even to meet other ravers who share the same passions that you do, there's always a takeaway that will leave you beaming.

This year, the hardworking team of organizers, including A-list sponsors such as DNA Presents, Desjardins, Bud Light, Beachclub, and more, are gearing up to tackle its biggest edition to date! 

The impressive lineup including Steve Aoki, Borgore, Zomboy, Jay Hardway, BTSM, Lost Kings, Riot Ten, Tritonal, 13, Domeno, Maurice West, and many more, are but one element that is attracting fans to the festival.

Another exciting aspect is the official after-parties! Although they were expected, they are a fantastic way to add to your overall Riverside experience. We strongly suggest that you check them out; they're always a great time!

 

Saturday:

  • Borgore (Barrymore's): https://www.facebook.com/events/404784847060838/
  • Jay Hardway (ALÉA): https://www.facebook.com/events/519110615513215/

 

Sunday:

  • Riot Ten (Barrymore's): https://www.facebook.com/events/677149292754353/
  • Tritonal (ALÉA): https://www.facebook.com/events/946803755667374/

 

In addition to these sought after events, the Riverside team decided to shake things up by offering an exclusive pre-party hosted on the festival's grounds. Even better? The first 1,000 tickets are free to 2-day ticket holders! Act fast.

That's right, Flag Fam, you can kick off your weekend early by witnessing special performances by Matroda in support by some of the best local talents in Canada's Capital!

Although we're still a little over a week away from the soon-to-be epic series of events, there are no doubts that the excitement is filling the air! Be sure to grab your tickets quickly; at this rate, all of the events will be sold out!

Written By Brittany Prevost
